name: Avail
description:
This is in part of my capstone that was centered around deep games. I recommend playing with a controller and headphones. Also below is the meaning behind the game. Please play before reading. 

The meaning of the game is the struggles of creativity. Along the way someone making a project gets inspired, they feel unstoppable, going through any challenges presented to them. Yet when they are not inspired or do not want to work on the project. Many challenges start to arise that would normally appear easy but suddenly become difficult, and at times the artist can get lost in their own head with no real goal.
